'Mmkay, I'm going to my room to do research.\nCall me when the bath is free.'%K%P
I hurried to my room after dinner was over.%K%P
'*Sigh*'%K%P
'It's rare for you to sigh like that...'%K%P
'Maika...'%K%P
Maika came to sit by me while I was thinking in\nthe living room.%K%P
'What are you thinking about?\nIf it's your Jinriki, I'm sure\nSho or Inori will think of something.'%K%P
'Oh, um, yeah, I guess so.'%K%P
'Oh? Something else, then? I was sure that was\nwhat was bothering you.'%K%P
'Well, I am worried about that,\nbut right now I'm thinking\nabout something else.'%K%P
'So you've got a bigger problem?'%K%P
'I'm not sure... Is it a problem?'%K%P
It might be, after all.%K%P
I couldn't stop thinking about Sho.%K%P
'I keep wondering why Sho\nworks so hard for me.\nWhy is he so nice to me?'%K%P
No matter how selfish I am, or how much I complain,\nhe stays patient with me, and just helps.%K%P
He was working so hard to get my Jinriki\nto come back even though it would be\nbetter for him if it never did.%K%P
It went beyond just nice.%K%P
'Why? Is it bothering you?'%K%P
'Of course not!\nBut he's so nice,\nit's kind of scary.'%K%P
Sho had been nice since we first met.%K%P
And not just me, to Inori and to Maika, too.%K%P
Sho was the same toward everyone, so clearly I\nwasn't anything special to him.%K%P
I guessed Sho didn't really think anything of me.%K%P
'Hmm... Well, that's just Sho.\nHe's always been that way.'%K%P
'But you know, Sho might get involved, but I've\nnever seen him get so into someone else's\nproblems before.'%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
So...maybe I was special?%K%P
When I thought that, something deep in my chest\nsuddenly felt warm.%K%P
'But, that's...just to protect Tsubaki...'%K%P
'Really? Do you honestly believe that?'%K%P
Maika stared into my eyes.%K%P
I couldn't find any words under that gaze.%K%P
'Maika, do you understand how he thinks?'%K%P
'Oh come on. We've lived together for years,\nbut that doesn't mean I know what's in his head.\nYou'll have to ask him that yourself.'%K%P
'Yeah, I guess so...'%K%P
My shoulders slumped.%K%P
Why did I suddenly feel so disappointed?%K%P
'This really isn't like you.\nIf there's something you want to know,\njust go ask him yourself.'%K%P
'B-But that would...'%K%P
I wanted to know what Sho thought of me.%K%P
I wanted to know why he was trying so hard.\nWhat was I to him?%K%P
Just another resident? Or--%K%P
'Akane, the later it gets,\nthe harder it will be to ask him.\nJust go do it.'%K%P
'That's what the regular old Akane would do,\nright?'%K%P
When Maika said that, my heart took a leap.%K%P
'Y-You're right.\nI shouldn't sit here fretting,\nI should be myself!'%K%P
I just couldn't stop worring about what Sho\nthought of me.%K%P
And it just wasn't like me to hang back.%K%P
'I'm going to go talk to him!'%K%P
'Good luck!'%K%P
I ran out of the room, with Maika watching after.%K%P
'Phew...'%K%P
I backed away from the computer and lay on the floor.%K%P
Even when I could find stuff about goddesses,\nthere just wasn't anything about\nproblems like Akane's coming up.%K%P
'I never thought it'd be easy, but this is\nridiculous.'%K%P
It was like trying to catch smoke.\nIt was harder than I'd thought.%K%P
But I still wanted to help as soon as possible.%K%P
'Akane...'%K%P
Since when had I started to think so much\nabout her?%K%P
Before I'd realized, I found myself watching\nher whenever she was in the room.%K%P
I thought about her in every spare moment,\nwondering what she was doing.%K%P
'Ugh, quit it. I have to focus!'%K%P
'Sho, it's me. Can I come in?'%K%P
'Akane? Come on in...'%K%P
'Hey there. Oh wow, so this is your room, huh?'%K%P
'There's nothing much to see.\nBut anyway, what's up?'%K%P
'Um... Well...'%K%P
It wasn't like Akane to hesitate so much.%K%P
'I've already come this far.\nI can't get sidetracked now.\nJust...wait a sec!'%K%P
Akane's eyes had been wandering around the room,\nbut then she slapped her own face.%K%P
'Right! I'm ready for this!'%K%P
'There's something I've been wanting to ask you.'%K%P
'What is it?'%K%P
'Why are you doing all this for me, Sho?'%K%P
'Huh? What do you mean?'%K%P
'I've been so happy about all you do for me, Sho.'%K%P
'But then I got scared, thinking that maybe\nyou were just being nice, that you don't\nreally care about me that much.'%K%P
'Oh, well...'%K%P
'So I wanted to ask you. Are you doing this\nto be nice? Is all your hard work for me\njust because you're a nice guy?'%K%P
I...what? Why have I been trying so hard for Akane?%K%P
Because I just can't let it go? That's one reason.\nAnd I really do want to save Tsubaki Apartments.\nThat's another.%K%P
But right now...%K%P
Right now, I just wanted to be there for her.\nNo matter what happened, I wanted to be by her side.%K%P
And the reason for that is...%K%P
'You what?'%K%P
Standing there like that, trembling as she stared,\nI found Akane so lovely.%K%P
And there it was.%K%P
I wanted Akane beside me, smiling, forever.%K%P
And so, it must be...%K%P
'I like you.'%K%P
'The reason I've been so kind to you is because\nI like you, as a girl.'%K%P
'You want to know what you are to me?\nIt's obvious...\nYou're a very special girl to me.'%K%P
'Wh-Whaaat?!'%K%P
'Uh... Huh? You... You mean...you..like...me?!'%K%P
'Yes, exactly. I like you, Akane.\nDoes that make you feel a little better?'%K%P
'Oh! Y-Yes, it does! I feel better!'%K%P
Akane nodded strongly, choked for words.%K%P
For some reason, my own self-consciousness\nor Akane's reaction, my hands suddenly\nclenched and my mouth went dry.%K%P
'And so what about you?'%K%P
'M-Me?!'%K%P
'So, I told you everything.\nNow it's your turn, tell me\nhow you feel about me.'%K%P
'Um, well... I-I think...I like you too.'%K%P
'You think?!'%K%P
'W-Well! I've never felt like this before!\nI don't know what this is!'%K%P
'Whenever I'm with you I feel so warm,\nand I want you by my side all the time.\nBut I'm an Aragami, I'm always causing trouble...'%K%P
'I don't care about that.\nAragami, goddess, none of it matters.'%K%P
'I like you, Akane Tsubaki, as the girl you are.'%K%P
'So I'll say it one more time.\nI like you.\nI want you to be my girlfriend.'%K%P
There was a long pause, it dragged on for seconds,\nmaybe minutes.%K%P
'Yeah... I like you too, Sho.\nI want to be your...girlfriend.'%K%P
As if some dam had burst, Akane looked up at me\nand smiled shyly.%K%P
'I'm sure I'll cause you all kinds\nof trouble, though.'%K%P
'I don't mind at all.'%K%P
I was so happy. I told Akane how I felt,\nshe told me how she felt,\nand now we were a couple.%K%P
'Oh... All the tension is broken, and now I\nfeel so relieved I'm weak.'%K%P
I smiled as Akane's knees folded and she slumped\nto the floor.%K%P
'I really wasn't expecting to blurt\neverything out like that.'%K%P
'Yeah, I wasn't exactly ready to make a huge\nconfession today either.'%K%P
But I had to admit, it seemed fitting.%K%P
'Hey... Can I move next to you?'%K%P
'Of course.'%K%P
'Heehee, okay, here I come!'%K%P
'Hey now!'%K%P
I thought she was just coming closer, but she\nsqueezed her hips in next to me.%K%P
'It's funny, just sitting beside you like this makes\nme feel happy.'%K%P
'Really?'%K%P
She scent of her there, so close, made my\nheart pound.%K%P
She leaned closer, almost as if she could\nread my mind.%K%P
'C-Come on now, don't crowd me!'%K%P
'Oh, why not?!\nYou're my boyfriend now!\nSee? Heheh!'%K%P
I couldn't help focusing on Akane's soft body\npressing against me.%K%P
'Oh, well, if that's the way you want to play it!'%K%P
'Whoa!'%K%P
I wrapped my hands around the base of her neck\nand she let out a surprised yelp.%K%P
'Sh-Sho?! What are you doing?'%K%P
'Payback. I've been wanting to do this\nfor a while now!'%K%P
'Oh... You're in for it now, buddy!'%K%P
Akane pressed even harder into me, irresistibly.%K%P
We went back and forth like that for a while,\nour faces getting closer as we wrestled.%K%P
'We must look like idiots.'%K%P
'And? This is fun!'%K%P
It was just a silly moment, but she looked so lovely.%K%P
'Hey, is it okay if I kiss you?'%K%P
'What?! K-Kiss?!'%K%P
'Is that a no?'%K%P
'N-No, it isn't.\nOkay...\nKiss me!'%K%P
'All right... Um... Here I go...'%K%P
I stared into her eyes and moved my face toward hers.%K%P
'Mwah.'%K%P
It was a light kiss, our lips barely brushing.%K%P
But even that was enough to set my heart pounding,\nentranced by Akane's charm.%K%P
'So...we kissed.'%K%P
'Oh... My heart is pounding!'%K%P
'Um, Akane?'%K%P
The second Akane had cried out, the lights in the\nroom went out and things went pitch black.%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
'Is it a blackout?'%K%P
We searched out each other's eyes in the darkness.%K%P
'Akane, is your Jinriki back?'%K%P
'I-I don't know.\nBut I feel like I did this...'%K%P
'Yeah. It looked like it happened just when you\nwere getting emotional...'%K%P
At any rate, as soon as the power came back I felt\nit'd be best to get Inori to look at Akane.%K%P
After a while, the power came back\nand we went into the living room\nwhere Inori and Maika were already waiting.%K%P
'Oh, there you are. Akane, did you cause\nthat blackout?'%K%P
'Yeah, maybe.\nI think it was me.'%K%P
'Inori, do you sense anything about Akane?'%K%P
She stared intently at Akane, then blinked\nher eyes rapidly.%K%P
'That is surprising.\nAkane's divine power has returned.\nWhat did you two do?'%K%P
'We didn't really do anything in particular.'%K%P
I couldn't really think of anything that could\nhave helped.%K%P
It just seemed to have returned on its own.%K%P
It wasn't as flashy as it had been, but it certainly\nlooked like Akane's power was fully restored.%K%P
'Well, it's good news! She's back to normal,\nand now you two seem to be getting along.\nHave you become a couple?'%K%P
'What? Is this true?'%K%P
'Y-Yeah. We just talked it over,\nand we're dating now.'%K%P
'Congratulations, Akane!'%K%P
'Th-Thanks, Inori.'%K%P
'But you sure figured it out quickly, Maika.'%K%P
'You two are practically glued together.\nAnyway, congrats.\nIf you hurt her, I'll never forgive you.'%K%P
'Got it. I'll be sure to make her happy.'%K%P
'Right. That's all I'm asking.\nCongratulations, Akane.'%K%P
'Maika... Thank you.'%K%P
At that, Maika smiled tightly and shrugged\nher shoulders.%K%P
'Well, with that and Akane's Jinriki,\ntoday certainly is full of good news!'%K%P
'Tomorrow I'll have to make something\nspecial to celebrate.'%K%P
'A recovery celebration. Good idea.'%K%P
'Sushi! Let's have sushi!'%K%P
'Okay, okay. I'll start getting things ready.'%K%P
I didn't understand why her power was back,\nbut seeing Akane smile like this\nagain was wonderful.%K%P
